K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-1: m'a y'a dz'a la ma h'a tantra r'a dz'a n'a ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-3: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-6: bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang ma'i steng na khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po bkod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-7: rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-8: shin tu mdzes pa'i rin po che bkod pas rnam par bkra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-10: yid las byung ba'i mchod pa'i khyad par chen pos brgyan pa; rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i cha byad sna tshogs 'chang ba rnams kyi don gyi bya ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-12: rnam par snang mdzad gyi snying po las yang dag par byung ba'i spyod pa bskyod nas zhal bzhi'i sgo'i go skabs nas byung ba sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287a-14: rin po che chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen @287b bo'i tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-1: rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-8: phyag brnyan mo du ma'i 'khor gyis bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi bde ba de'i bdag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-11: thugs rje chen pos mnyes gshin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-12: sems can thams cad bsgral ba la brtson par mdzad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-22: mi ma yin pa la sogs pa mang pos brgyan pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-24: de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi khyams kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje 'dug pa la gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-25: 'dzum pa mdzad ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar nas 'gying bag can du bltas nas rdo rje gsor te pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-27: dgongs ba ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:287b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum pa mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288a-1: des na bdag dang 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur pa lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288a-2: de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis seng+ge chen po'i sgra dbyangs kyis bka' stsal du gsol; de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de skad du gsol ba btab ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa rgyud thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma'i thabs bde ba rdo rje'i ye shes sgrub pa rol pas mnyes par bya ba'i thabs de kho na nyid thams cad kyi 'byung gnas stang stabs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i thabs dang shes rab bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes sgrol ba rol pas bzhad cing bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud kyi dam tshig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288a-17: nyam thag par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-0: gsang sngags mang po'i @288b 'jo tshul rnams ngas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-1: de'i phyir khyod kyis kyang ting nge 'dzin mchog la snyoms par zhugs la nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-2: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-4: gzhan yang gang dag 'khor du 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam mnyan par brtsams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-5: de la re zhig dang po dngos grub ni; slob dpon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-6: slob dpon med par gyur na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-7: dngos grub thob par mi 'gyur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-8: slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-9: ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-10: brtan zhing dul la blo gros ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-11: bzod ldan drang zhing g-yo sgyu med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-12: gsang sngags rgyud kyi sbyor shes pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-14: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-15: sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-16: theg pa che la rtag dga' ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-17: de ni slob dpon yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-18: phyi rol bstan bcos yongs shes shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-19: nyan thos rnams kyi lam 'gro dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-20: gsang ba de nyid bsdu ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-21: theg pa chen po mi shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-22: snying rje yod pa ma yin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-23: dad med brtson 'grus mi ldan la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-24: rtag tu ngan pa'i tshul spyod dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-25: bstan bcos rnams la smod pa min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-26: gong du bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-27: ldan na slob dpon yin par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:288b-28: de yis dkyil 'khor bri ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-0: de nyid kyis ni rgyud rnams @289a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-1: bstan; ;de yis bstan pa'i gsang sngags dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-3: dge dang sdom la dga' ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-4: rtag tu bla ma la gus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-5: rgyun du lha rnams mchod byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-6: yon tan ldan na slob ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-7: slob dpon ci 'dra blta zhe na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-8: bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-9: de nyid rtag tu rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-11: de ni ye shes rgya mtsho che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-12: yid bzhin nor bu rin chen bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-13: slob dpon gyi ni yon tan gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-14: skyon rnams nams kyang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-15: yon tan bzung bas dngos grub cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-16: skyon rnams kyis ni dngos grub nyams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-17: de yi grib ma'ang mi 'gom ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-18: mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-19: rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-20: dam pa gang yin spangs par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-21: slob dpon smod par byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-22: rmi lam du yang mthong mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-23: slob dpon smod pa gang yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-24: bgegs dang log 'dren rnams kyis bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-25: ngan pa gtum po las byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-26: mkhas pas rtag tu spang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-27: mnar med shin tu skyi g-ya' ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-28: dmyal ba bstan pa gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-29: der ni slob dpon smod byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-30: gnas par 'gyur zhes rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-31: de phyir kun gyis rab bsgrims te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289a-32: bsam yas 'bras bu smin byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-0: @289b sems can dad pa ldan pas mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-1: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-3: 'jug pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la gzigs nas sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen po ye shes bsgyings pa gsang ba'i byin rlabs kyi mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms bar zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-5: snyoms par zhugs nas kyang rdo rje 'chang la bka' stsal ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-7: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyi ma'i yang phyi ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-8: ye shes chen po'i snying po 'bar ba rdo rje bsnyen bkur byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir dbang bskur na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-9: dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-11: sems can gang la las tshon rtsi mthong ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas pa dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba la yang dag par zhugs pa de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas nyid kyi grangs su 'gro bar 'gyur ba de nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-13: dang po kho nas yongs su bzung ba byas te slob dpon gyis lha nyid kyi stang stabs su 'dug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:289b-14: lag pa g-yas bsgrims te rdo rje gsor zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-0: lag pa g-yon pas dril bu gsil nas @290a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-1: rdo rje 'gros kyis yongs su bskor bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-2: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa khro bo'i nga rgyal gyis h'um zhes brjod cing dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi brjid pa gang gis bskor nas kyang khro bo'i skur bsgoms nas sdang ba'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-4: gsang ba pa rnams la tshig 'di rab tu brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-5: slob dpon ming 'di zhes bya bas slob ma che ge mo zhig rdzogs pa'i byang chub rdzogs par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-6: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir sa phyogs 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po ming 'di zhes bya ba bri yis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-20: rgan po'am rgan mo g-yog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-21: 'khor du bcas pa gang dag 'khod pa rnams dengs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-22: 'di ltar rdo rje 'chang gi bka' thos nas myur ba nyid du dengs shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-23: gang dag mi 'gro ba de dag ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-24: phyag na rdo rje h'um zhes bya ba rab tu khros pa'i bzhin 'bar pa can gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar bas mgo tshal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290a-25: zhes lan gsum brjod nas stang stabs la gnas bzhin dus gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-4: rus sbal gyi rkang stabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-7: rkang pa ya gcig gi stangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-16: rdo rje 'jigs su rung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-17: rdo rje ro langs ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-21: bud med kyi sgyu 'phrul stang stabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-42: thag mdung bskor ba'i thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:290b-45: mtshon rtse gcig pa'i thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-3: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-14: rgyal ba'i phur bus gnas pa'i bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-16: dra ba dang ra bas mtshams gcad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-17: phyogs bcing ba de lta bus sa gzhi rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs par bsgoms te gtan la dbab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-18: rang gi ming nas smos te h'um zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags kyi sgra brjod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-19: 'khor lo thams cad kyi bla na med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-20: de nas sa'i lha mo sta gon du gnas par bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-21: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-22: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-23: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-24: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-25: dngos grub thams cad thob bya'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-26: bdag gis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-27: zhes la na gsum brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-28: de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sta gon du gnas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-29: thugs brtser gnas pa'i dgongs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-30: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291a-31: sras dang lhan cig gshegs nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-0: sa gzhi yongs su gzung @291b bar mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-1: de nas 'khro lo'i dbus su chos kyi dkyil 'khro byas la mtha' kun tu yang mtshan nas smos te thig leng bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-2: de ltar spyan drangs te mchod pas mnyes par byas nas phyir byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-3: de nas sems can sta gon du gnas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-4: spos chus spyi bor bsang gtor byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-5: lag pa snying gar bkram nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-6: rtse mo lnga pa rgya gram bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-7: g-yas pas srung skud bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-8: lag mthil so shing ku sha sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-9: de nas 'dug ste gsum la skyabs su btang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-10: sdig pa kun tu bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-11: bsod nams kyis rjes su yi rang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-13: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-16: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-17: sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-18: 'gro ba'i dge la yi rang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-19: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-21: de nas ci nus kyis ci 'dod pa'i chos bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-22: de nas sngar bshad pa bzhin du mnyes par 'gyur ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga bzang po bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-23: slar yang gshegs su gsol bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-24: de nas nang du zhugs la dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhir glo g-yas pas nyal te rmi lam bzang ngan bltas nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:291b-25: tshon dang thig les sangs rgyas lnga'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-1: bo dag kyang sprul par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-2: 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-3: sems can rnams ni rnam grol mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-5: rnam par snang mdzad rgyal bdag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-6: nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-7: tshon rtsi dgye ba brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-8: dang por slob dpon nyid kyis dgye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-9: de nas kun tu slob mas bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-10: dang po sa gzhi yongs gzung pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-11: gnyis pa sta gon gnas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-12: nub gsum pa ni 'jug pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-13: tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-14: khru stong pa'am lnga brgya bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-15: dkyil 'khor dam pa thig gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-16: yang na khru lnga khru do pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-17: khru gang ba yi bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-18: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-19: rta babs bzhis ni brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-20: dbus su 'khor lo legs par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-21: dkyil du rnam par snang mdzad gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-22: shar phyogs su ni mi 'khrugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-23: lho phyogs su ni rin chen 'byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-24: nub phyogs su ni 'od dpag med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-25: byang phyogs su ni don grub rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-26: 'khor lo grar ni lha mo bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-27: dngos grub sbyin par mdzad par bri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-28: dbang bdag gi phyogs su ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-35: lha mo sgrol ma'o; ;rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-37: lhor rdo rje rin chen ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292a-39: byang du rdo rje las ma rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-0: gra @292b rnams su skul byed ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-3: rdo rje lu gu rgyud rnams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-4: de nas yang 'gying bag tu langs te rdo rje shugs kyis phyir phyung nas rim pa gsum pa la shar phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-8: lho phyogs su bzang skyong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-10: blo gros mi zad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-11: spobs pa brtsegs pa rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-12: nub phyogs su mthu chen thob dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-13: ngan song thams cad spong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-14: mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-15: dra ba can gyi 'od rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-19: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba rnams bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-27: bgegs kyi gshed mthar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-35: sgo'i nang logs su yang rdo rje bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:292b-43: sna lngas bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-0: de nas dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor @293a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-2: sgo bzhi dang ldan pa rim pa gnyis par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-4: padma brgyad pa snying po dang bcas pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-5: snam bu gnyis pa la shar phyogs su ni; rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-12: de lta bur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-13: de nas slob dpon gyi lus legs par bkrus te spos kyis bskus nas legs par brgyus pa'i me tog gi phreng ba mgo la bcings nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-14: mgul pa dar gyis bcings pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-15: ldum bu yis ni kha bkab pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-16: rin chen sman 'byung sna lnga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-17: spos chu yis ni bkang pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-18: bum pa mngon par bsngags par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-19: rnam rgyal bum pa dkyil 'khor gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-20: bdag po lha mo rnams kyi bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-21: lha rnams kun gyi bum pa bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-22: sgo yi phyogs kyi bum pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-23: las kun byas pas bzlas brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-24: sems can kun gyis bsang gtor bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-25: yang na ku sha'i chun pos bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-26: de nas bum pa mngon par bsngags te lha bshos dang gtor ma phul nas me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-31: zhabs bkru ba la sogs pa dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-32: de rnams phul nas bum pa rnams grar gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-33: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293a-34: dbus su spyan drang par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams sbyan @293b drangs nas gsal bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-6: dra bas phyogs bcing ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-12: bdug pa la sogs pa yang bsngos te phul nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rang rang la bstan par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-15: dril bu gsil ba'i sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-18: rgyud kyi sgra'i khyad par yang dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-19: rol mo'i khyad par gzhan rnams kyis kyang bstod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-20: bstod nas bzod par gsol te dngos grub thams cad kyi phyir gsol ba gdab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-21: de nas slob dpon bdag nyid zhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-22: de'i 'og tu slob ma gzhug go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-23: de nas sems can thams cad snying po 'di dang phyag rgyas gnas lngar srung zhing gnas lngar cho ga bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-24: h'um aom dzi na dzi na ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-29: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gzhug par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-30: rdo rje ye shes thob byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-31: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-33: bdag gis slob ma gzhug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-34: rdo rje sems mas me tog gtor bar bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-36: tshigs su bcad pa 'dis gdong g-yogs 'gril lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:293b-37: de ring dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-1: gyis; ;sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-2: sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-3: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-4: dam tshig mchog tu grub par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-5: rdo rje padma rol pa'i mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-6: sngags kyi bdag nyid shes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-7: de yi snying po 'di yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-9: gang la me tog bab pa de de'i lha yin no; ;de nas dbang bskur sbyin bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-10: dri dang me tog phreng bas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-11: gos dang rgyan gyis legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-12: steng du bla re bre bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-13: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-14: lha dang tshangs pa'i skud pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-15: gdu bu dag dang ska rags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-16: bkra shis yo byad rnams kyis klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-17: slob ma sdig dang bral ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-18: slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-19: dang por rnam rgyal bum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-20: de nas lha mo bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-21: lha rnams kun gyi bzhi po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-22: bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-23: rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-24: skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-25: til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-26: rgyal ba bum pa bzung nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-27: de nyid la ni dbang bskur bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-28: dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-29: de lta bur ni bsams nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-30: chos kyi mtshan nyid bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-31: thur ma me long 'khor lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-32: dung dang rdo rje glegs bam dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294a-33: gser dag dang ni dngul rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-0: mi shes rab rib la @294b sogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-1: ci nus par ni bsal bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-2: thur ma la sogs med na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-3: phyag rgya'i gzugs rnams bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-4: de nas dam tshig bstan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-5: de ring phyin chad bu khyod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-6: srog dang lus la bab gyur kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-7: dam pa'i chos dang byang chub sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-8: slob dpon la ni brnyas mi bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-9: rdo rje spun rnams bkur sti zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-10: sdang la byams shing chags bral ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-11: nam yang bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-12: de ltar byas na sangs rgyas kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-13: khyod ni dmyal ba'i nang du 'dor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-14: de nas bla mas yon blangs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-15: sa dang yid 'ong chung ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-16: rin chen gser dang nor bu 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-17: mu tig byi ru la sogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-18: lus kyang dbul du gzhugs par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-19: bla ma la ni gus pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-20: slob mas de bzhin kho nar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-21: bla ma de ni mgu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-22: bla ma mgu ba dngos grub kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-23: gzhan du min zhes thub pa gsung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-24: de nas slob ma bslang ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyan sngar mchod pa bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-26: de nas cho ga mthong bas las byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-27: sbyin sreg bzlas brjod mchod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-28: de bzhin sgom pa'i rim pa'i tshul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-29: zhi dang rgyas pa'i rim pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-30: las rnams thams cad tshim par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-31: de nas dus gsum gshegs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-32: rgyal ba thams cad gshegs su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-33: bsgribs te tshon rtsi rnams bsdus nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-34: chu klung chen por bskur nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-35: ba yi lci bas byug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:294b-36: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-1: dpon nyid kyis bsdu bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-2: slob mas cung zad mi spyad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-3: de ni dam tshig nyams par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-4: slob dpon gyis kyang ci rigs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-5: bdag nyid 'dod pa spyad par bya; ;rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-7: dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas yang gsang sngags kyi 'khor lo la 'jug pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-9: snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa; phyag na rdo rje /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-10: gsang sngags kyi snying po'i yi ge rnams nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-11: phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-12: sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-13: bde bar gshegs pas bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-14: aom las rnam par snang mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-16: aom tr'am rin chen 'byung gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-18: aom kham don yod grub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-19: aom ga ga na lo tsa ne h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-21: aom ki ri ki ri m'a ma k'i h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-23: aom ka te bi ka te ka tam ka ta ka ro ta b'i r+ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295a-25: aom t'a re tutta re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-2: aom tsa le tsu le tsun de sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-4: aom ratna lo ke ratna dzva li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-8: aom badzra shram khi le h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-9: rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i 'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-14: aom sa manta bha dra h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-16: aom gandha ha sti ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-18: aom dzny'a na ke tu ba ti h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-20: aom bha dra ba ti bha dra p'a la h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-22: aom s'a ga re ma h'a s'a ga re h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-25: aaksh'a yaksha aa ka karma a'a ba ra na pa ri sho dha na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-27: aom pri bh'a ne pra ti bh'a ne ku te h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-29: aom sth'a me mah'a sth'a me ba ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-31: aom sarba aa p'a ya dza te sarba p'a pam sho dha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-32: ngan song thams cas sbyong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-33: aom sarba sho ka ta mo ni dza ma ti h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-34: mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blog ros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-35: aom dz'a li ni mah'a dz'a li ni h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-37: aom su dha na shri ye h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-39: aom tsandre tsandre tsandra bya ba la ki te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-41: aom aa mri te pra bhe aa mri te h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-43: aom ga ga ne ga ga ne pa ra lo tsan h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-45: aom sarba ni pa ra na bishkam bhi ne h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:295b-46: sgrib pa rnam par sel ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-1: mri ta kunda li bighnanta krita /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-3: aom aa tsa la h'um ham/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-7: aom n'i la danda ma h'a danda h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-8: be con sngon po'o; ;aom kro dha h'um dza:/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-9: stobs po che'i dkyil 'khor du dgod pa'i gsang sngags kyi yi ge de dag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-10: 'di dag la brten nas ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las nges par 'byung ba'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag du ma gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-14: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so; ;rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-15: rigs kyi yum rnams kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-22: de dag la sogs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-24: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-26: gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296a-27: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-0: ras sam rtsig pa la sogs pa la gzugs brnyan bsgrubs @296b pa la dmigs pa gang gis gsang sngags 'chang rnams kyis ye shes rdzogs par 'gyur zhing ye shes rdzogs pas sangs rgyas nyid bde blag tu thob par 'gyur na dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshogs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gsang chen bla na med pa bshad par bya yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-2: aom gyi ye shes kyis bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-3: rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-4: shes rab ye shes rab rgyas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gis mchod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-6: zhi ba thor tshugs cod pan 'chang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-11: g-yon gyis lha mo'i nu ma 'dzin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-16: rab tu byung zhing legs 'khyud pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-20: aom zhes bya ba'i tshig gi lam; ;'jig rten dbang phyug 'od chen bsam //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-22: dbu brgyan thams cad mkhyen pas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:296b-23: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-2: zhal gsum spyan gsum 'bar ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-3: phyag drug 'dug stangs bzhi pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-5: g-yas na bgrang phreng rdo rje 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-6: g-yon pas nu ma 'dzin pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-7: ril ba spyi blugs gsum pa na //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-17: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab klubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-18: cod pan la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-19: rin chen rnams kyis yongs su brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-20: zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-22: phyag brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-23: rdo rje dang por gsor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-24: gnyis pa na ni ral gri gdengs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-25: lcags kyu bzang po gsum pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-26: bzhi pa yis ni mda' yang gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-27: de bzhin g-yon na dril bu bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-28: de bzhin gnyis pas nu ma 'khyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297a-29: gsum pa na ni zhags pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-0: bzhi pa @297b lha rdzas gzhu yang 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-1: rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-2: de bzhin sangs rgyas sprin gyis 'bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-4: de yi rdo rje sems brtan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-5: ring por mi thogs byang chub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-6: rga shi rnams kyi pha rol 'gro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-7: sems can gyi stobs mtha' yas pa rdzogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po rdo rje shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-8: tram gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-10: zhal ras gsum ldan spyan gsum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-11: thor tshugs cod pan rnams kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-12: bde ba chen po kha dog dmar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-13: ting 'dzin phyag rgya rnam par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-14: sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-15: phyag g-yas ni na rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-16: g-yon pa rin chen yongs su 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-18: rin chen 'byung ba'i sprin chen nam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-19: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-20: rin chen char gyis rgyas par byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-21: rin chen mngon par thob pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-22: kham gyi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-23: don yod rdo rje bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-24: ting 'dzin phyag rgya legs bzhugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-26: g-yas pa'i phyag na ral gri dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-27: g-yon pa yis ni lcags kyu nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-28: sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-29: legs par grub phyir slar yang sdud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-30: 'od zer chen pos rab gsal zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:297b-31: ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'od dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-2: nam mkha' snying po thub pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-3: 'du byed thams cad spangs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-4: mkha' dang mnyam par de 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-5: nam mkha'i snang bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-6: la yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-7: rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-8: lha mo spyan gsum phyag brgyad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-9: zhal gsum gser gyi mdog dang mtshungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-10: sgeg pa'i cha lugs legs 'chang ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-11: cung zad bzhad pas 'dod chags ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-12: dang po'i phyag ni mchog sbyin mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-13: de bzhin gnyis pa mi 'jigs sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-14: phyag gsum pa ni rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-15: bzhi pa na ni mda' yang gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-16: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-17: rin chen snye ma gnyis pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-18: gsum pa na ni bgrang phreng ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-19: bzhi pa gzhu yis legs par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-21: lha rnams 'jigs pas sems myos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-22: lag pa thal mo sbyor bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sprin 'phro bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-24: ye shes rdo rje spyan ma bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-25: byang chub yan lag 'bras brgyan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-27: ye shes spyan gyis snang bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'jo tshul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-28: ma yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-30: lha mo zhal gsum phyag drug ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-31: dgod cing zhal ras khro dang bcas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298a-32: autpa la sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-0: 'od dmar shin tu 'bar @298b ba can; ;dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-1: gnyis pa legs par rdo rje bsdams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-2: gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-3: g-yon pa sdigs pa'i mdzub mo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-4: gnyis pa zhags pa legs par bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-5: gsum pa yis ni gzhu yang 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-6: rdo rje can ma sku gsum 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-7: dngos med ngo bo mtshan nyid can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-8: sangs rgyas kyi ni sprin 'phro ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-10: sgyu 'phrul 'byung ba'i stobs kyi ye shes zab mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-11: pa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-13: ming ni gos dkar can zhes bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-14: spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-17: gnyis pa na ni rdo rje ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-18: gsum pa mda' yis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-19: g-yon pa padma bsnams par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-20: gnyis pa na ni bgrang nor phreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-21: gsum pa na ni gzhu bsnams shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-22: rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-23: sangs rgyas gzugs ni 'phro bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-24: padma'i sprin gyis rgyas par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-25: gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-26: rin chen sku ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-27: padma'i gzugs kyis 'jo tshul sangs rgyas kyi rgyal ba 'dren pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-28: ta yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:298b-30: 'jo sgeg cha lugs la gnas pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-2: bzhad pa ma rgad 'od dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-3: dang po mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-4: gnyis pa na ni rdo rje bsnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-5: gsum pa na ni mda' yang gsor //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-7: gnyis pa na ni autpal nyid //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-12: rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-13: sems can thams cad dbang du 'gro zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-14: skyes mchog rgyal bas gsungs pa yi //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-16: sems ma dang ni rig chen ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-17: chos ma rdo rje las ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-18: rol pas rjes su mnyes mdzad ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-19: de dag ji ltar rigs par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-20: de dag kyang ni bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-21: ring por mi thogs byang chub thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-22: sems can rab tu dga' byed pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-24: ming ni skul byed ces ma'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-25: sku gsum rgyal ba byed pa phrag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-28: lha dgu rnams kyi gnas kyang yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-29: zhal gsum ston kha'i 'dam bu'i mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-30: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299a-31: na chung skal ldan dar la bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-0: rig sngags thams cad @299b sgrol mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-1: dang po'i zhal ni cung zad tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-2: bzhad cing spyan gsum ldan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-3: g-yas kyi zhal ni rnam gdangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-5: mche ba zla ba tshes pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-6: lce ni glog bzhin ljib par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-7: g-yon pa kha dog dmar po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-8: tshems kyis sgros ni rnam par mnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-9: rol pa'i stabs su legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-10: gdu bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-15: bzhi pa na rin po che sbyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-16: lnga pa na shing tog b'i dza pu ra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-17: drug pa na mda' gsor ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-22: bcu gcig pa na rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-23: bcu gnyis pa na se go la gtog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-24: bcu gsum pa na bgrang phreng ngo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-27: bzhi pa na ril ba spyi blugs so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-33: bcu pa na sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-34: bcu gcig pa na bum pa bzang po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-35: bcu gnyis pa na thag mdung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:299b-36: bcu gsum pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-2: la yi zhing cung bgos pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-3: steng du bla gos gyon pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-4: sna tshogs tshig gu na bzar gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-5: cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-6: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs 'phro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-7: sum cu'i lha rnams ltung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-8: bgegs rnams shin tu 'jigs skrag par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-9: thal mo sbyor bar byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-11: bsgrims nas gsang sngags brjod pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-12: sangs rgyas nyid du thob 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-13: dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-15: sdig pa kun las rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-16: rgyal ba mtha' yas pa'i ye shes skul bar byed pa'i stobs kyi rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-17: ra yi ye shes la bsgrubs pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-19: zhal ras gsum pa spyan gsum pa //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-21: na chung dar la bab pa'i tshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-22: zhal ni cung zad bzhad pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-23: phyag ni rin chen gdu bus gtams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:300a-24: phyag gnyis rin chen thal mo ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-15: rol pa'i stang stabs tshul du gnas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-17: rnal 'byor sems dpas bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-18: sangs rgyas rang bzhin gzugs dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-20: rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-21: kha zas thams cad za byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-22: nang gi sngags pas sngags brjod cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-23: rim bzhin rnal 'byor gyis bsgems na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-24: byang chub myur du thob 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-25: bla na med pa'i bde ba 'dren //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-26: 'dod pa thams cad rab bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-27: ha la ha la yongs su mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-28: sa yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-29: stong chen rab tu 'joms mdzad pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-30: lha mo nad kun 'phrog ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:307b-31: sdang ba'i sems can 'joms mjad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-1: stong ldan zhing dbu stong la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-2: spyan gsum dag gis rnam par brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-3: brtson chen phyag brgyad khro ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-4: steg pa'i thabs kyis dgongs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-5: phyag g-yas mchod sbyin lha rdzas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-6: ral gri lcags kyu mda' dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-7: phyag g-yon padmo rdo rje nor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-8: zhags pa gzhu dang sta re can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-9: mdog dmar zhal ras bzhi pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-10: bgegs stong 'joms par mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-11: rang gi rnal 'byor la brtson pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-12: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs 'jug cing spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-13: glang po rta dang skyes pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-14: za bar mdzad ma phreng ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-15: de yi las kyis bskul ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-16: gsang sngags dpa' bos gdon par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-19: dpung chen po la rnam par lta //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-20: ba thams cad srung ba stobs kyi mchog stong chen po rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-21: dhv'am zhes bya bas skyed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-22: sdigs pa'i mdzub mo'i phyag rgya can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-23: drag mo chen mo zhal bzhi pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-24: spyan gsum phyag brgyad kyis rnam brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-25: ral gri gtun shing 'khor lo mda'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-26: mdud rtse gsum pa rdo rje gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-27: chom rkun mdzub mos bsdigs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-28: rdo rje ro langs 'byung ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-29: mthong bas dbung rnams bcom gtor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308a-30: lha mo rtag tu bsgoms na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-0: ring por mi @308b thogs byang chub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-1: 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms pa la mkhas pa mchog gi rtse mo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-2: pra yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-3: stobs chen pha rol gnan mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-4: spyan gsum phyag brgyad g-yas pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-5: ral gri 'khor lo mdung rtse gsum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-6: mnga' yis rnam brgyan phyag g-yon na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-7: rdo rje zhags pa dgra sta gzhu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-8: bsnams bas sdang ba'i bgegs ltung mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-9: bu mi 'tsho dang mo gsham dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-10: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bcu gnas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-11: lha rnams kun gyi bum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-12: slob dpon gyis ni dbang bskur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-13: de yi mngal du byis ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-15: zhags pa'i phyag rgyas mtshan ngan nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-16: skyes pa gzugs can 'byung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-17: dran pa yis ni dral nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-18: mngal ni bsod nams dag gis spel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-19: mngal thams cad rnam par lta ba so sor 'brang ma'i ye shes kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-20: ba yi ye shes rol pas bskrun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-21: lha mo nor gyi blo gros ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-22: gzi byin gser gyi mdog can la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-23: phyag drug lang tsho dar la bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-24: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-26: de yi phyag g-yas mchog sbyin mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-28: gsum pa yis ni mda' yang gsor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:308b-29: phyag g-yon yid bzhin nor bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-0: @309a *// grogs mo'i skye bos yongs bskor cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-1: mngag gzhug gnod spyin mo yi gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-2: rin chen char pa 'bebs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-3: nor kun gyi ni char ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-4: 'bebs par byed pa bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-5: nor gyi blo gros chen mo 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-6: de ltar sngags pas bsgoms na de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-7: dpag tshad bdun ni rgyas par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-8: nor gyi char gyis khyab par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-9: byang chub sbyin mchog dam pa ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-10: de ltar rnal 'byor bdag nyid bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-11: nor gyi rgyun gyi char rab tu 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-12: bi yi ye shes las bsgrubs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-13: srin mo 'bar ba'i klog phreng can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-14: ming ni dngul dkar las skyes mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-15: stobs mo che la pha rol gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-16: gsus 'phyang me la mche gtsigs ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-17: skra ser ram kham pa gyen du brdzes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-18: thor tshugs cod pan gyis brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-19: spyi bo la ni mi 'khrugs bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-20: bcu gnyis dbu dang bco brgyad phyag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-21: spyan ni gsum gsum thod phreng ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-22: drag mo lag na rakta yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-23: bkang ba'i thod pa thogs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-24: smad g-yogs seng+ge'i pags pas g-yogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-25: sbrul gyi mchod phyir thogs pa can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-26: ral gri lcags kyu 'khor lo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-27: gtun shing rtse gsum dril bu dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-28: ba dan ltag dbyug mdung mchog sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-29: gzhu mda' mdung thung be con dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-30: zhags pa dgra sta tho ba thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309a-31: rgyan rnams kyis ni lus la brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-0: mdog nag @309b rol pa'i stabs kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-1: padma'i gdan bzhugs sdang ba dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-3: rtag tu h'um gis h'um mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-4: bzlas brjod yang dag ldan par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-5: sems can kun don tshogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-6: byang chub ring por mi thogs 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-7: sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa'i mchog rab byang chub kyi snying por rnam par rgyal ba'i stobs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-8: kshim zhes bya bas sgom pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-9: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-10: na chung gzhon nu 'jo tshul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-11: mgo bo skra tshugs phyed du bzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-12: de bzhin du ni stod g-yogs kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-13: la dkar seng ba bgos pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-14: de la kha dog lnga pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-15: ma tog 'phrul ba rnams kyis brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-16: gser gyi mdog can bzhin 'dzum pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-17: phyed zur bas ni rnam par rol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-18: dpag bsam shing gis brgyan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-19: rin chen ri la legs par bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-20: 'jam pa'i khro bo rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-21: de yi mgo bo mnan nas bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-22: tha ma thog thag gnod sbyin mos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-23: nam mkha' gang bar bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-24: gnod sbyin mo thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog rab ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-26: yi ge gsum pa mig gsum gzugs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-27: khyab 'jug lha chen mes bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-28: gdong gsum rang gi mtshon thogs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-29: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis bskul can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-30: rdo rje ting nge 'dzin bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:309b-31: mod la dngos grub thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-1: rten thams cad grub pa mig gsum rnam par rol pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-2: gzhan yang gsang sngags yi ge yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-3: sa bon gang gis sbyar byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-4: rdo rje yig 'bru rnams bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-5: de dag ma bsgrims bzhin du sgrub //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-7: bu ni lnga brgya po rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-8: lnga rtsen dang ni dpal can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-10: rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-11: ting nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la zhi bar lta ba rdul dang bral ba'i mchog rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las sna tshogs kyi ye shes skyed par mdzad pa 'di dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-13: aom bha ga ba ti ru ru sphu ru dzva la tishtha siddha lo tsa ne sarba aartha s'a dha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-14: de nas las thams cad rab tu rdzogs par byed pa 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-15: sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-16: byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams dgyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-17: bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dar gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-18: sangs rgyas rdo rje rjes dran byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-19: zhi ba sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310a-20: rdo rje dam tshig gis bskul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-0: shi ba @310b rnams la srog sbyin mjad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-1: ma grub pa rnams grub par rtsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa sku gsum rdo rje 'bar pa'i mchog dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyems par zhugs nas rdo rje 'chang mchog thams cad skyed pa'i yum rdo rje dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-5: ghu ta ghu ta ghu ti ni gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya gha ti ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-6: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-7: rdo rje gsum las skyes gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-8: thams cad kyi ni mig phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-9: rdo rje shugs ni rjes dran gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-10: sgrub pa thams cad srung mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-11: de bzhin las rnams sgrub pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-12: sdig pa thams cad 'joms ma ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-13: zhi dang rgyas dang 'phel mdzad ma'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'dod chags chen pos zhen pa padma gar gyi stang stabs thugs kyi rdo rje gsum gyis rnam par 'thor ba'i dam chig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos thams cad 'dzin pa mchog gi yum 'di rdo rje gsum rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-15: aom ka te bi ka te ni ka te ka tang+ka te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-16: de nas chos kyi rgyal mtshan mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-17: dam pa 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-18: ting nge 'dzin gyi mig phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-19: rdo rje padma rjes dran byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:310b-20: rgyas pa chen po yum yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-2: bsgoms shing bsten te bzlas brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-3: rgya cher srung bar mdzad pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dbang du bya ba khong du chud pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-5: rdo rje gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis dga' bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ye shes la 'jug par byed pa sna tshogs thams cad 'chang ba'i yum gyi sgrol ma 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-6: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-7: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-8: sangs rgyas kun dang sras kyi rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-9: spyan phye rnam par gdangs nas su; ;ye shes rdo rje ldan par dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-10: lha mo bzlas brjod byas tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-11: skya rgu rnams ni mngag gzhug 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi ye shes la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di rdo rje gsum las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-14: aom kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-15: sarba dushta satva da ma ka aa si mu sa la ba ra shu p'a sha ha sta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-20: sarba dushta pr'a n'a aa pa ha ri n'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-21: mah'a bi ghnam gh'a ta ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-22: bi kri ta a'a na na; sarba bhu ta bha yam ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-23: aatt'atta h'a sa n'a di na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311a-24: by'a ghr'a tsarma ni b'a sa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-0: a'a karsha ya a'a karsha @311b ma; sarba bh'u t'a na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-4: pra be sha ya bra be sha ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-5: manda la ma dhye bee ba shva ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-11: m'a bi lamba m'a bi lamba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-15: bi spo ta ya bi spho ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-16: sarba n'a sha ya ri p'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:311b-18: bighnan sarba a'a sha pa ri p'u ra ka /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-24: 'jam pa'i rdo rjer rnam par bsgom //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-26: lag na rdo rje lcags kyu thogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-28: gnod sbyin bu mo bkug nas spyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-29: phyag rgya gsang sngags sbyor ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-31: yis; ;dgug par bya ba'i tshig gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-33: rgyal po'i zhabs drung kun gnas pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:315b-34: rdo rje sems dpa' sems dba' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-2: yang dang yang du skul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang bar mdzad chen pos rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas ye shes kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rgyal mo chen mo rnam par bsgyur ba'i rdo rje 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-5: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-6: klu mo dbang chen grags pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-7: gos dang bral zhing tshig bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-8: gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-9: gsang sngags rig sngags 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-10: klu rnams thams cad 'gugs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-11: bsam gtan rdo rje mthu dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-12: gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-13: gsor gdub rgyan ni gsol ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-14: klu mo mig yangs bku gnas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas chags pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-16: klu mo nye bar spyod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' chen po'i shugs rgya mtsho 'phro ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas skul byed ma chen mo'i gzugs kyi rig sngags chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-19: samyaksam buddha ko t'a ni na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-21: aom tsa le tsu le tsu nde sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-22: de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316a-23: sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi @316b lus; ;ting nge 'dzin las g-yos par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-1: bdud rnams brgyal zhing tshe ga nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-2: thams cad cho nges 'debs par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-3: sa yi 'og gi bu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-4: lha min bu mo klu mo dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-5: gsang dbang bu mo rnams 'khrugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-6: gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-7: rig sngags 'di ni bzlas pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-8: sgom pa yi ni sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-10: bkug nas rab tu longs spyod byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos bdud rtsi'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i khro gnyer 'di rdo rje sku gsum rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-12: aom bha ya n'a sha ni tr'a sa ya tr'a sa ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-13: bhee ra ti bhri ku ti ti ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-14: bee ta ti bee ta ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-17: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-18: rig sngags 'chang dang lha rnams ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-19: g-yo sa shing 'jigs pa thob par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-21: gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-22: yid gcig tu ni dran par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-23: nor bu'i gdub rnams g-yo ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-24: rig sngags 'chang ma klu mor bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-25: lha min bu mo gsang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-26: bu mo bkug nas spyod par byed; ;'dis ni las kun byed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-28: yang na gsang sngags thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:316b-29: skye bo med pa'i na gas tshal du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-2: las rnams thams cad bya bar gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-3: gang gzhan slob dpon smod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-4: theg pa chen po sun 'byin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-5: mi gang gsang sngags rgyud dag gi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-6: sbyor ba la ni 'phyag byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-7: de yis dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-8: de ni rtag tu gdon gyis zin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-9: bsgrims nas gsad par bya ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-10: yang na lus ni gzhig par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-11: sngags pas 'di ltar byas nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-12: byang chub dngos grub legs par 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-13: phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-14: sku gsum ye shes las byung ba'i /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-15: khyad par du ni bsgom par bya; ;dgra la 'di ni the tshom med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-17: dur khrod thal ba'am bshang gci yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-18: brlan pa'i gos ni bgos nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-19: rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-20: khro bo'i rgyal por sbyor byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-21: gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-22: sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-23: chus brlan pa yi gos bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-24: khro bo'i mdun du bcings nas su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-25: rkang pa g-yon pas mnan na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-26: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-27: bshang gci yis ni sngags pa'i gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-28: rul ba'i da cin smad pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-29: bgos nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-31: dur khrod thal bas bsdus pa'i gos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317a-32: bgos nas khro bo'i 'khrugs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-0: lan grangs stong du @317b brjod ma ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-1: rdo rje sems dpa'ang rnam par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-2: skra ni lhug par bshig nas ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-3: kha bzhin rnam par bsgyur byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-4: rkang pas mtshan ma mnan nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-6: ma mo'i gnas sam dur khrod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-7: khang stong ngam ni bzhi mdo 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-8: mtshan ma gcig pa'am shing gcig tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-9: drag shul spyod pa brtsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-10: de yi rkang rjes sa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-11: mi rus las byas phur bu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-12: sor brgyad tsam gyis tshad tsam la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-13: lan grangs brgya rtsa brgyad brjod pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-14: phur bu yis ni btab nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-15: dgra yi khyim sgor brkos te gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-16: sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-17: shes dang mi shes spangs da [?]//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-18: zla phyed nya yi nang rol tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-19: 'ching ba'am yang na 'jig par 'gyur; ;mkhas pas thod pa yongs tshang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-20: khyad par can ni rnyed pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-21: de la gsang sngags tshig bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-22: rdo rje tshig gis bzlas brjod nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-23: dgra yi sgo'am yang na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-24: grong du sbas na nges par skrod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-25: ta la'i 'dab ma'am gzhan la'ang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-26: khro bos gsang sngags legs bris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-27: dgra yi khyim mam sgo khar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:317b-29: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos bka' stsal te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsum @318a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-1: rdo rje'i phur bu'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te khams gsum thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-3: gha ta ya gha ta ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-5: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-7: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-8: badzra dha ra a'adzny'a pa ya ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-9: k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-10: k'i la ya h'um h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-11: de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-12: rdo rje dbang chen grags pa kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-13: brgyal nas 'jigs pa skyes gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-14: rdo rje rnam snang mdzad pa dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-15: mi yi rus pa'i phur bu'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-16: yang na seng ldeng las byung ba'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-17: lcags las byas pa'i phur bus ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-18: rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-19: rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam bzhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-21: sku gsum rdo rje mthas gtugs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-22: gzugs brnyan la ni bsams nas sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-23: rnam snang phyag rgya chen po'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-24: yang na 'dod chags rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-25: phyag rgya chen po gshin rje gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-26: 'dod pa'i khro bo nyid du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-27: rdo rje phur bu bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-28: bdag nyid chen po stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-29: bdud rtsi thabs sbyor rdo rje dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-30: rdo rje yi ni rnal 'byor gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318a-31: sdang dang gtum po gcad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-0: @318b sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-1: thugs nas zhabs la thug par du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-2: rdo rje phur bus rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-3: rdo rje ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-4: sangs rgyas dag kyang nges par gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-5: 'di ni phur bu'i mthu rlabs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-6: steng 'og lha yi dam tshig yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-7: rgyal chen rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-8: sangs rgyas thams cad gnon pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes rnam par bsgyings ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i sku gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig gi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-15: phan tshun bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-16: mthe bo'i ngos kyi drung du bsdu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-17: snang mdzad zhabs kyis mnan nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-18: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya //
