K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:318b-21: dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-0: gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur; ;de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i thugs kyi ye shes chen po rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i stang @319a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-1: stabs kyi phur bu zhes bya ba'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-3: rtse mo lnga pa bcings nas su; ;me stag 'phro ba bsgoms byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-4: rdo rje thugs kyis zhabs kyis mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-5: rdo rje phur bus gdab par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-6: btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-7: sku gsum ye shes las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-8: dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-9: gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dam tshig mchog rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gsung gi dam tshig gi stang stabs kyi phur bu'i gsang sngags 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje rnams las phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-11: aom tri aom bhurbhub: rdo rje sor mo bcum pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-13: 'dod chags rdo rje zhabs kyis mnan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-14: rdo rje phur bus nges par gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-15: btab pa tsam gyis rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-16: sku gsum ye shes las 'byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-17: dam tshig mchog gis bzhengs par mdzod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-18: gzhan du byas na brlag par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-19: sku gsung thugs kyis chags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-20: cho ga bzang po tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319a-21: rdo rje mkha' dbyings mthas gtugs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-0: ces bcom @319b ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rdo rje phur bu'i tshig rnams bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-1: de nas sangs rgyas sku gsum mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-2: sems can khams la phan bzhed rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-3: dgyes shing mgu ba brnyes nas su /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-4: rdo rje dbyings kyis 'di skad gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-5: kye ma 'o gsang ba'i tshig gi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-6: kye ma'o gsang ba kun 'dus pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-7: kye ma'o zhi ba chos kyi tshig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-8: ye shes rdo rje phur bu rmad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-9: gsang sngags kun gyi phur bus 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-10: bde gshegs bka' yi rjes su byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-11: 'di dag sangs rgyas kun gyi ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-12: phur bu de nyid rnams las byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chom rkun thams cad mdongs par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo 'od zer can 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-14: aom m'a r'i tsyee de ba t'a ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-15: rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-16: dbang chen grags pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-17: thugs ni dgyes shing mgu bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-18: sras rnams kyi ni spyan yang phye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-19: 'di ni las rnams thams cad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-20: chom rkun sdang ba 'ching mdzad ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:319b-21: 'di yi sbyor ba la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas sdang ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa sems can thams cad sgrol bar byed pa'i ye shes chen po'i stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge @320a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-1: 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas stong chen po rab tu 'joms pa'i rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-2: aom ma h'a sa h'a sra pra marda na ba ra siddhi da m'i ge ma ni badzra ni h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-3: de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-4: sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-6: bdud kyi ris rnams g-yos par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-7: gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-8: thams cad tshig bzhin btud nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-9: bcom ldan rig sngags mthu stobs kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-10: gnod bgyid thams cad gzir lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-11: gang ni rig sngags stobs mo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-12: pha rol gnod pa 'di zlos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-13: der ni bdag cag mi mchi zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-14: der ni srung ba dag kyang bgyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas brgya byin mngon par mtho ba'i stobs lha ma yin rnam par 'joms pas srnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan gyi gzungs chen po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-16: aom bha ga ba t'i dhva dz'a gra ke yu re pa ra see n+ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-17: bi dhva na sa na ka sva see n+yapa ri la ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320a-23: aa nanta mu khe pra ha ra pra ha ra h'um phat phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-0: de nas rig sngags che gsungs @320b pas; ;sangs rgyas zhing rnams g-yos par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-1: byang chub sems dpa' rab g-yos shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-2: bdud kyis de rnams tshig par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-3: gnod sbyin srin po gos bral nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-4: 'jigs shing skrag par gyur pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-5: gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang dran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-7: rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyi tshig lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-8: bdag cag dam tshig la gnas par 'tshal lags na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-9: mgon mdzad cing lus thams cad rab tu sgrub tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas mngal thams cad yang dag par skyes pas khyab pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo so so 'brang ma 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-11: aom ma ni dha ri badzra ni ma h'a pra ti sa re sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-12: rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-13: rig sngags rgyal mo'i mthu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-14: mi yi skye rgu 'tshe byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-15: mthu chen mngal ni 'phrog pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-16: log 'dren kun dang sdang ba'i rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-17: mi bzad me lces tshig gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-18: 'jigs pa dang ni skrag pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-19: rdo rje snang mdzad drung lhag ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-20: zhabs la gtugs te tshig smras pa; ;bdag cag dam tshig gnas par 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-21: rig sngags dam tshig rtag gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-22: gang gis mngal yang mi 'phrog cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:320b-23: rtag tu mngal ni spel bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-1: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas nor gyi rgyun gyi yang dag par 'dzin pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rig sngags gyi rgyal mo chen mo nor rgyun 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-2: aom ba su dha ri ma h'a ba su dha ra bri shta ni p'a ta ni ba su sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-3: nor gyi rgyun ces bya ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-4: rig sngags gsungs pa'i mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-5: bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-6: yid ni 'jigs shing skrag gyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-7: rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-8: drung du nye bar 'ongs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-9: dam bcas pa yi tshig smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-10: bcom ldan nor rgyun ces bya ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-11: mtshan ni mi mchog sgrog bgyid na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-12: de la nor gyi char 'bab cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-13: nor chen dang ni ldan par ba gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod par byed pa thams cad 'dul ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas srin mo glog 'bar ma sgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-15: aa re du tre ni pra ku pa ha tsanda /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-16: ma h'a be ga dha ri bid s'a dhu dzi tre /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-18: roo dra ki p'a la ma la dh'a ri na dza ta mu ku ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-20: n'a n'a pra ha ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-21: dha ri h'um h'um phat phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-22: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-30: pa tsa ta pa tsa ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321a-31: be kira ta sa ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-4: dzv'a la dzv'a la h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-5: che ge mo zhig me sha m'a n'a ya sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-6: de nas srin mo 'bar ba'i glog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-7: rig sngags chen mo gsungs pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-8: bdud kyi gnas rnams tshig par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-9: dgra rnams kyi ni snying yang bskams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-10: dur khrod kyi ras la srin mo btsag gis bris nas legs par sbas te gu gul gyi bdug pas sreg cing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-14: lha bshos dmar por byas pa byin nas dur khrod du brko bar bya'o; ;de'i steng du ming nas smos shing brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis gtor to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-15: brkos pa'i mong la phyir rgol ba dang dgra thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-16: mnan pa dang rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phrog ma'i dga' ston gnod sbyin mo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje chen po 'phrog ma'i gsang sngags 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-18: aom h'a ra triee ma h'a ykshi n'i ye /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-20: sarba yakshi ni phra be sha ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-22: gnod sbyin chen mo gsungs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-23: gnod sbyin ma kun g-yos nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-24: dngos grub phyir ni mngon phyogs gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:321b-25: khro mo'i 'khor lo gnod sbyin ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-0: @322a *// brgyad dbus 'phrog mas brgyan byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-1: lcags kyu 'bras bu ne le can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-2: gnong sbyin brgyad kyis klubs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-3: gnod sbyin ma kun bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nad chen po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas mi ngas chen po zhi bar mdzad pa'i rigs sngags ri khrod kyi shing lo can ma 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-5: aom bi sh'a tsi parna sha ba ri sarbba m'a ra pra sha ma ni h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-6: de nas rig sngags che gsungs pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-7: sangs rgyas zhing rnams rab tu g-yos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-8: gnod byed nad 'gro srin po dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-9: sdang ba rnams kyi snying yang zags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-10: yam shing 'o ma can dang til //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-12: nam mkhar kun nas rig sngags kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-13: rgyal mos legs par bkang nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-14: bdud rtsi char 'bebs bsams na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-15: mod la gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-16: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-17: 'di ni; gsang sngags kyi ye shes rnam par bsgyings pa'i rim par phye ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pas phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-0: sku gsum ye shes kyi rdo rje las yang dag par byung ba lag pa'i phyag rgya tha dad pa rnams mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis nyon @322b cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-1: gang zhig bcings pa tsam gyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-2: sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-3: 'di ni lus ni byin brlabs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-4: rang gi gzugs su rnam bsgoms na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-5: sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-6: dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-7: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mthe bo gnyis bteg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-9: sku byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-10: de nyid las g-yon pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g-yas pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-12: gsung byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-13: de nyid las g-yas pa'i mthe bo nang du bcug ste g-yon pa'i mthe bo bteg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-15: thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-16: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcings pa las g-yon pa'i mdzub mo bsgrengs pa'i thor to g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis bzung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-17: rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-18: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung du 'dug nas lag pa g-yon pa pang par bzhag ste g-yas pas la gnon pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-20: nga nyid las g-yas pa mchog sbyin par byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-21: rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-22: de nyid las lag pa gnyis bsam gtan gyi tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-24: de nyid las g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin par byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:322b-25: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-1: pa gnyis rdo rje bcings pa byas pa las gung mo gshibs te bsgrengs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-2: rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-3: de nyid las gung mo'i tshigs dang po bkug ste rin po che'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-4: rdo rje rin chen ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-5: de nyid las gung mo padma'i 'dab ma ltar gdu bu'i tshul du byas pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-6: rdo rje chos ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-7: de nyid las gung mo nang du bskum pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-8: rdo rje las ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-9: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te mthe bo'i rtse mor mig gi tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-10: sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-11: rdo rje bcings pa las gung mo bsgrengs pa'i tshigs gsum par mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bzung ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-12: m'a ma k'i'i phyag rgya'o; ;lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar te padma kha bye ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-13: gos dkar can gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-14: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las mdzub mo gnyis bkug pas gung mo'i sen mo mnan te mthe bo gnyis dbus su bzhag nas cung zad bkug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-15: sgrol ma'i autpa la'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-16: lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar te mdzub mo dang gung mo'i tshigs dbus mar gdu bu'i tshul du byas nas mthe bo gnyis glor bzhag pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323a-17: skul byed ma'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-0: de nas rdo rje bcings pa byas pa @323b las mdzub gnyis mo gnyis mthe bo'i rtse mor bkug pa 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-1: rin chen sgrol ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-2: lag pa gnyis brkyang ste mthe bos so so'i mthe'u chung gi sen mo mnan nas lhag ma rdo rje'i mtshan nyid du byas pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-3: khro gnyer can ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-4: lag pa gnyis so sor khur tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lug gu rgyud ltar bcings pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-5: rdo rje lug gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-6: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las gung mo dang srin lag gnyis bsgrengs te rtse mo'i tshul du byas la gung mo'i rgyab tu srin lag bsnol la mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i tshul du byas pas dkris pas mthe bo gnyis mdun du bzhag pa las cung zad bkug ste kha'i tshul du byas pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-7: gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-8: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag ste lag pa g-yas pa thal lcag gi tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-9: khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-10: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis la the'u chud lug gu rgyud ltar mdud la mdzub mo gshibs te bsgrengs pa las ldog ste dpral bar bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-11: rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya'o; ;lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bos srin lag dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyi sen mo mnan la ral gri shubs nas dbyung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:323b-12: 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-0: @324a *// lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcas pa las rgyab sprad de mthe'u chung gnyis lug gu rgyud ltar bcings nas mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs pa las zhags pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la g-yas pa khro bo'i sor mo be tson gyi tshul du 'phyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-3: be con sngon po can gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-4: lag pa g-yon pa rdo rje snying gar bzhag la g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par 'phyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-6: lag pa gnyis so sor khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo bsgrengs te sprad nas me tog gi tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-8: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyis srin mo mnan nas autpal la kha phye ba'i tshul du bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-9: 'jam dpal dbyangs kyi phyag rgya'o; ;lag pa g-yon pa pang par bzhag la lag pa g-yas pa glang po che'i sna ltar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-10: spos kyi glang po'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-11: g-yon pas rdo rje khu tshur nam mkha' la bsgrengs pa lag pa g-yas pa'i sor mo ba dan gyi tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-12: ye shes me tog gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324a-13: bzang po'i 'dug stangs su 'dug ste thal mo khong stong du sbyar te snying gar bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-1: lag pa gnyis chu rlabs kyi tshul du brkyang ba las sor mo rnams chu rlabs drang pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-2: blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-3: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag la g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-4: blo gros mi zad pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-5: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur pang du bzhag la g-yas pa se gol gtogs pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-6: spobs pa brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-7: lag pa gnyis padma cung zad kha bye ba ltar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-8: mthu chen thob kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-9: lag pa gnyis me tog 'dor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-10: ngan song thams cad spong ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-11: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar ba las bsnun pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-12: mya ngan thams cad kyi mun pa nges par 'joms pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-13: lag pa gnyis brkyang nas 'phro ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-14: dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-15: g-yas pa mchog sbyin par byas la g-yon pa zla ba'i tshul du byas ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-17: lag pa gnyis bum pa'i tshul du byas nas dbang bskur ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-19: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur byas la g-yas pa'i khu tshur nam mkha' la kun tu bskor ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-20: nam mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:324b-21: g-yon pa sa la brkyang nas lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang mthe bo sprad nas zhi ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-0: @325a *// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-1: g-yon ba rdo rje khu tshur las khro bo'i mdzub mo snying gar bzhag la h'um zhes bya zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-2: lag pa g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur rdeg stangs dang bcas par 'phyar ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-3: ri khrod lo ma can gyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-4: lag pa g-yon pa sor mo brkyang pa las mdzub mo dang mthe bo skam pas 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas la; lag pa g-yas pa khab kyi tshul gyis 'tshe bar byed pa rnams kyi kha mig 'drub pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-6: lag pa gnyis spyi bor sbrul mgo gdengs ka'i gdugs ltar byas nas phud ces brjod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-8: 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i phyag gnyis las mdzub mo gnyis bsgreng ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-9: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-10: de nyid las g-yas pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyus dza zhes byas pas dgug pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-11: rdo rje khro bo lcags kyus dgug pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ba ste rdo rje khro bo lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-13: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi mthe'u chung mche ba'i tshul du byas pa las bsnol te 'gram pa gnyis su bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-14: lce ljib cing khro bo'i lta bas blta bar bya ba ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-15: rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325a-16: de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis bskum /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-0: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas nas kha'i grar bzhag ste h'um zhes bya zhing khro bo'i lta bas lus @325b gcu ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-1: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-2: lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste bsnol nas gyen du bteg pa ltar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-4: de nyid las mkhrig ma gnyis bsnol te bstod cing bteg pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-6: lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bsnol nas mchan khung du bsnams te khro bo'i lta bas 'gyur ba dang bcas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-7: gdon thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-8: lag pa g-yon brkyang ste kha sbub pa la de'i steng du g-yas pa bzhag nas lag pa gnyis kyis sor mo bskyod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-9: lha ma yin gyi sgyu dang 'phrul 'khor 'byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-10: lha ma yin gyi bu mo smrar gzhug pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-11: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud ltar bcings te bzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-12: lhag ma ba dan rtse gsum pa'i tshul du byas nas stang stabs dang bcas par h'um zhes bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-13: khro bo rdo rje sa 'og gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-14: g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyi khro bo'i mdzub mos bsdigs pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-15: rdo rje bdag mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-16: rdo rje bcings pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste phur bu'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-17: rdo rje phur bu'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-18: g-yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur brdung ba'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:325b-19: rdo rje tho ba'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-0: lag pa gnyis rdo rje khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis brkyang ste rdo rje mdud pa dor ba'i tshul du byas pa @326a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-1: ni; de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje bcing pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-2: lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur bcangs te sog le drang pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-3: rdo rje sog le'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-4: lag pa gnyis thal mo zla ba'i tshul du bya ste gdong g-yogs shing brkyang la khro bo'i mig tu byas nas aa la la zhes bya ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-5: rdo rje srin mo'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-6: lag pa gnyis lu gu rgyud du bcings pa la mdzub mo dang mthe bo gnyis padma'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-7: sprin thams cad gtub pa'i char pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-8: lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa las mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu ltar byas te skam pa'i tshul du dpung pa brkyang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-9: 'khrul 'khor gyi phur ba dbyung ba'i skam pa'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-10: lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag ste lhag ma rnams 'dab ma ltar g-yab cing rkang pa ya gcig sa la btsugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-11: gcig rgyab tu bskums nas khro bo'i lta bas lce ljib cing h'um phat ces bya bas rim gyis bskyod pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-12: rdo rje nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-13: 'di bcings pa tsam gyis khams gsum khyab pa'i dug kyang skad cig gis sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-14: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis mda' gzhu gang ba'i tshul gyis phyogs bzhir mda' bkang ste 'phangs pas pha rol dpung gzhig pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326a-15: mnyes par bye dpa'i rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-0: khu tshur gnyis @326b las gung mo gshibs te bsgrengs ba las rin po che'i tshul du bku ga la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-1: mthe bo brkyang ba'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu'i chul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-2: sangs rgyas 'khor lo can gyi phyag rgya g-yul las sgrol bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-3: lag pa g-yon pa'i mthe bos sor mo mnan te gung mo bsgrangs la g-yas pas padma kha 'byed pa'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-4: ha la ha la'i phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-5: khu tshur gnyis kyis mthe'u chung gnyis dkris la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te bsgrengs nas ldog la dpral bar bzhag pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-6: rdo rje khrag 'thung gi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-7: dur khrod du 'jug pa na mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-8: g-yon pas thod pa bzungs la g-yas pas mdung rtse gsum thogs nas ral ba bcings te zla bas brgyan cing mtshan bsgrengs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-9: mig gsum pa gar byed pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-10: gar thabs kyi phyag rgya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-13: g-yon pa mi 'jigs par byas pa las sor mo rnams cung zad phya ste mthe bo lag mthil du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-14: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i khu tshur dbyug to 'dzin pa ltar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-16: lag pa gnyis brkyang nas padma'i tshul du byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-18: lag pa gnyis thal mo khong sdong du sbyar te me tog ltar byas pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-19: ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-20: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-21: rgyab du mdud pa ltar 'dor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:326b-22: rdo rje sems ma la sogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-3: 'khor lo mnga' ba'i lha rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-4: sangs rgyas sa ni rab 'gengs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-5: gsang pa'i mchod pa 'byung bar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-7: sgeg mo yi ni phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-8: gar gyi tshul du bkod nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-9: h'um zhes bya ba glur blangs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-10: de nas sangs rgyas kun dgyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-11: rdo rje rgyud ni bsgreng bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-12: de nas phreng chul phreng ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-13: lha rnams kun la bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-14: 'jo sgeg thabs la spro ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-15: lag gnyis bskor zhing dgrol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-16: g-yas nas g-yon du bskor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-17: gar thabs byas la mgo la gzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-18: me tog dbul ba'i tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-19: gang gis me tog thal mo sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-20: bdug spos rtse mo sbyar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-21: gung mo gnyis ni ldog ste bsgreng //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-22: bskor zhing bsgyur ba byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-23: mthe ba gnyis mar me'i tshul du bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-24: dung gi tshul du lag bsgyur nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-25: dung phor lta bur mchod yon dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-26: de nas lha rnams kun la yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-27: lag pa'i gar gyis byug tshul bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-28: de nas sil snyan tshul gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-29: lag gnyis sil snyan legs par brdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-30: dung dang gling bu 'bud pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-31: lag pa gnyis ni rnga yag g-yob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-32: bsil yab tshul gyis bsil yab dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-33: sor mo gnyis kyis rgyal mtshan bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-34: tshon dgye tshe na lcug phran ltar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327a-35: bskyod cing tshon gyi phreng ba dgye //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-0: lag g-yon snod @327b kyi tshul byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-1: g-yas pa yis ni lha bshos dbul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-2: khang pa brtsegs pa bzhag nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-3: gos kyi tshul gyis gos rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-4: gdu bu ska rags rkang rgyan dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-5: rna cha do shal gnas lngar bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-6: de nas gdugs kyi tshul gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-7: lha rdzas gdugs ni legs par gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-8: bsam gtan tshul gyis lag pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-9: nam mkha' la ni mdzes bskor na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-10: sangs rgyas zhing rab 'gengs byed pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-11: bla re rnams pa sna tshogs 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-12: grar ni padma'i phreng ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-13: dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-14: gsang sngags 'di ni cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-15: rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis; ;sgo 'phar dag kyang dbye bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-16: aom badzra gha nda ra ni ta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-19: pra dzny'a pa' ra mi t'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-20: na' ta' sva bh'a be bdzra dhrma hri da ya snto sha ni h'um h'um h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-21: lag g-yas rdo rje gsor bya zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-22: sna tshogs khugs su 'gyur ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-23: rdo rje glu yis bstod da bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-24: rdo rje theg pas mnyes byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-25: 'di ni don dam mchod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-26: gang gis rnam rtog rnam spangs te; ;byang chub sems ni rnam bsgoms pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-27: lus ngag sems ni rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-28: de yi mchod pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-29: sems can gang gis dbu ma yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-30: theg pa gong ma ma bsgoms shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-31: theg pa dman pa lhag mos pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-32: de yi mchog pa kun rdzob pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-33: sangs rgyas dbang chen grags kun gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-34: mchod pa de dag gsan pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:327b-35: ngo mtshar byung ba'i spyan phye nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-2: ae ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-3: byang chub sangs rgyas thabs su ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-4: rdo rje bsgom pa byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-5: nyon mongs med par byang chub 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-6: rdo rje theg chen legs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-7: sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-8: zab cing rgya che legs pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-9: rdo rje rin chen kun 'dus legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-10: de nas ye shes kyi sku gsum las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdo rje theg pa bsngags pa thos nas dga' bas spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-11: gtso bo rdo rje snang mdzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-12: dga' pa'i yid kyis bstod par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-13: thod ma med cing skye ba med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-14: 'gyur ba med cing gnas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-15: mkha' bzhin rnam rtog las grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-16: rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags thabs su brtags pa gang yin des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-17: ye shes kyi ni sras po kun //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-18: rdo rje theg pa bsgoms pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-19: sangs rgyas sa yang thob par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-21: bde ba las 'khrungs rdo rje 'chang ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-22: dngos po dngos med 'byung gnas chen por mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-23: dang po gang du rnam par snang mdzad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-24: dag cing dri med blos ni aom du sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-25: gzugs mang tshul gyis phreng bas bskor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-26: sgyu 'phrul dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-27: gsung snyan yi ge kun la khyab pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328a-28: spros med gsung du 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-0: mig gsum lha @328b mo dang bcas 'dul mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-1: sgyu 'phrul tshul mang ldan pa 'ga' ma mchis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-2: gang du bde chen rang bhzin rjes chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-3: na chung dag dang lhan cig bzhad mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-4: g-yas pa'i phyag gos rdo rje gsor nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-5: g-yon pa'i phyag gis dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-6: lha mo mtha' dag btsun mor gyur ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-7: dam tshig rnams kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-8: gcig gi lag pas kun nas 'khyud pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-9: gnyis pa rjes su chags phyir bde ba'i mthu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-10: gsum pa mi bzod me tog phreng ba 'thor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-11: bzhi pa bde ba yis ni mda' yang 'phen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-12: gang zhig glu 'di len par byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-13: bde ba'i rdo rje can dang mnyam par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-15: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje'i glu yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-16: aom aa nutta ra sarbba pa'u dza me gha auda gte spha ra na ai mam ga ga na kham h'um phat sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-17: 'di lan gsum brjod pas mchod pa'i sprin rab 'byams thams cad byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-18: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-19: 'di ni phyag rgya'i mchod pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste drag pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-21: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis tshig mthun par sgra dbyangs gcig gis gsol ba btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-22: bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:328b-23: ye shes gces pa dri med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-1: chub sems ni rin po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-2: bla na med pa bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-4: sems ni lus kyi rnam yin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-5: lus kyang sems kyi rnam pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-6: sems kyang tshig gis brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par sbyor ba thos nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do; ;ae ma kun tu bzang po ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-8: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-9: chos rnams skye ba med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-10: g-yo ba med cing gnas pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-11: rtog pa'i dri ma spangs pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-12: bskyed par bya zhes rab tu gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsung spros pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-15: chos can med cing chos nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-16: nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329a-17: byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin; ;zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis de bzhin @329b gshegs pa thams cad dmigs su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-1: dngos po 'di dag dngos med de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-2: chos kyi mtshan nyid spangs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-3: bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-4: byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog gis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyis rdo rje me lce 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-7: dngos po skye ba med pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-8: dngos po ngo bo yod min pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-9: nam mkha'i go 'phang thob bo zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-10: dngos rnams rab tu brjod pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-11: zhes bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla ma'i yang bla ma ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-13: chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-14: gzod nas dag cing rnyog pa med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-15: sems can med cing srog kyang med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-16: sangs rgyas nyid dang byang chub med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-17: rmi lam sgyu ma ltar snang ba'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-18: byang chub sems 'di brtan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:329b-19: zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub kyis gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-0: de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' @330a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-1: sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa mthong nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-2: kye ma'o sangs rgyas kye ma'o dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-3: kye ma'o chos ni bstan pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-4: bdag med chos las legs byung ba; ;byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-5: byang chub sems ni sgom pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-6: mi g-yo yi ge las byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-7: rmi lam sogs ltar ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-8: byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal lo; ;gnas dang stan ni rnam bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-9: sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-10: dang por rang bzhin dag pa'o zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-11: dag pa'i chos kyi tshul la gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-12: yid kyis h'um byas rdo rje can; ;rdo rjes sems mas byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-13: rin chen lus su nga rgyal bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-14: lag pa bstod de bskor ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-15: lcags kyu yis ni spyan yang drang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-16: byon nas dang por phyogs bcings te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-17: dam tshig dag kyang dbul bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-18: gdan rnams so sor phul nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-19: mchod yon dbul pa'i sbyor ba bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-20: dbang bskur mtshon cha go sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-21: sil snyan mchod sogs ngo bo bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-22: rnam pa kun gyis mnyes par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-23: rnal 'byor dbang nyid can gyis brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-24: rnal 'byor rnam gsum shes bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330a-25: byin gyis brlab dang yongs brtags dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-0: gzugs gnyis rdzogs @330b par gyur pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-1: rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-2: sngags kyis byin brlabs nga rgyal bskyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-3: rnal 'byor byin brlabs yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-4: byang chub sems ni dag pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-5: gsang sngags sa bon bskyod pa che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-6: phyag rgya'i tshogs su brtags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-7: rim gyis gzugs ni rdzogs byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-8: de ni brtag par brjod pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-9: rnal 'byor cho ga yin par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-10: bsdu dang spro bar byas pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-11: rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-12: skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-13: rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-14: dang por dam tshig byin brlabs par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa bdag gis brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-16: rab tu rdzogs par bya ba dag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-22: dag gyur de nas blo yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-23: sems la so sor brtag par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-24: sems la so sor brtags nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-25: phyi rol rang bzhin stong par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-26: sems tsam la ni gnas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-27: byang chub tshogs kyi bag chags des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-28: bsgom par bya ba'i ngo bo dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-29: zla pa'i gzugs su rnam par brtag /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-31: aom gyi myu gus bskrun pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-32: yan lag kun gyi mtshan nyid gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-33: rdo rje skur ni bsgom par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:330b-34: a'a:zhes bya ba spros med gsung //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-1: sprul; ;yi ge gsum gyi byin brlabs lus //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-2: snying la gnas pa'i zla ba'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-3: de la rang gi yi ge ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-4: mdog gzugs 'od ni phyed bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-5: nga rgyal bskyed nas de la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-6: rdo rje'i bdag nyid bdag yin brjod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-7: rgyan kun yongs su rdzogs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-9: cha shas kyi ni dra ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-10: ye shes sems dpa' rdzogs par brtag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-11: de 'og lag pa'i phyag rgya yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-12: go cha mtshon cha la sogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-13: rdzogs sangs rgyas lngar dbang bskur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-14: cod pan phreng ba rnams kyis klubs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-15: de nas de 'og sangs rgyas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-16: sprul pa mdzad pa'i sgyu ma spro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-17: yan lag bzhi pa'i dbus ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-18: phyogs bcur khro bo bcu dag dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-19: snyems ma dang ni rtogs ldan ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-20: mtshon cha mda' dang rtse mo can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-21: sgyu ma'i cha byad rnam mang po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-22: rnam par 'phrul par byin gyis brlabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-23: kun la khyab par byed pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-24: sna tshogs dbus su bzhag nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-25: de nyid chen po bdag nyid lngas; ;phyogs bzhi'i 'khor lo khyab byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-26: dga' bas dga' byed bzhi yang sbong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-27: ting 'dzin kun gyi dga' ba la //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-29: 'khor lo la ni rdo rje'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-30: padma'i gzugs la de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-32: ngo bo yis ni rol ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-33: ae zhes bya ba 'phos pa las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331a-34: mdog ldan bdag nyid gzugs su bya //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-4: sil snyan mchod pa'i rnam pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-5: sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-6: rnam pa kun dang ldan par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-7: bdag nyid kyi ni lus bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-8: myur ches pa dang bul ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-9: mi gsal gug skyed nyams pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-10: rtog pa ngan pa rnam spangs nas //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-13: bsgrims te rdo rje gsor nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-14: g-yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-15: rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-19: lus dang ngag dang sems bsgoms te //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-21: bar chad du ni gyur na yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-22: yi ge brgya pas byin gyis brlab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-23: de ltar bsgom pas sgom byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-24: rdo rje theg pas rab rdzogs pa'i //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-26: zla nyi'i dkyil 'khor lta bur snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-27: sna tshogs las kyi thog 'dren cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-28: rin chen rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-29: chags chen padma'i gdung rgyud can //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-32: dga' chen rdo rje lcags kyur 'gyur //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:331b-35: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-1: sgom pa'i ye shes sgrub pa rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka'i 'khor lo rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyi nang gi 'khor lo thams cad rab tu sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi las kyi sbyor ba rab 'byams 'di bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-3: lha ni gang yang rung ba zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-4: 'khor lo'i dbus su bzhag na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-5: de yi ming smos rdo rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-6: dkyil 'khor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-7: zhi dang rgyas dang drag shul dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-8: rang gi las la sbyor ba na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-9: 'khor lo'i rgyal po rnam bsgoms nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-10: bdag po nyid kyis rab tu bya; ;zhi ba spyan dang skul byed mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-11: rgyas la rin chen gos dkar mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-12: dbang la sgrol ma lu gu rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-13: yams dang gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-14: 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-15: drag shul spyod la m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-16: khro gnyer can ma dag gis bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-17: 'di dag shes rab rol ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-18: chags pa'i rdo rjes rdzas chags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-19: gsang sngags de nyid kyis bskul na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-20: gdon mi za bar 'phrin las mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-21: spyan dang lha mo skul byed ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-22: dbang po zhi ba zla 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-23: phyag gnyis na ni bgrang phreng dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332a-24: ril ba spyi blugs kyis brgyan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-0: dang por ting 'dzin @332b gyis sprul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-1: bum pa zla ba'i mdangs ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-2: bdud rtsi'i 'o mas rab bkang ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-3: lag gnyis padma'i gdub mchog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-4: rnam par snang mdzad zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-5: nad pa la ni gdugs par bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-6: rin chen ma dang gos dkar can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-7: sku tshe kha dog ser po ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-8: lha mo ser mo snang ba la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-9: phyag na rin chen padma can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-10: dang por ting 'dzin gyis sprul nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-12: rin chen 'byung ba'i zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-13: bdud rtsis rab tu dgang ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-14: bla med rin chen khar bab na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-15: rgyas pa mtshungs med mdzad par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-16: lha mo sku chen mdog dmar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-17: sgrol ma de bzhin lu gu rgyud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-19: lha rdzas lcags kyu zhags thogs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-20: rab tu bzhad cing spyan phye bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-21: 'od dpag med pa'i zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-22: bsgrub bya rgyags pas myos pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-23: bkug ste mda' yis bsnun na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-24: skad cig nyid la dbang du mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-25: mi ngas gnod pa gzhig pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-26: sku chen nam mkha'i kha dog can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-27: 'od zer can dang ri khrod mas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-28: rdo rje don yod zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-29: mkhas pas sngar bshad tshul du ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-30: bdud rtsi yis kyang rnam par bzlog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-31: lha mo khro gnyer m'a ma k'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-32: margad lta bu'i mdog can ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-33: h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrog pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-34: rdo rjes bsdigs pas brtson pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-35: rdo rje mi 'khrugs zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:332b-36: khros nas rdo rje'i me yi char //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-1: par rnam par bsam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-2: rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-3: bsgrub bya tshig nas mog ces byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-4: sbyor ba 'di yi mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-6: yang na lus ni 'jig par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-7: byin brlabs dam tshig dbang bskur la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-8: rdo rje sems ma rin chen dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-9: chos dang rdo rje las ma bzhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-10: sbyor ba rnams ni rab tu sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-11: sems dpa' chen po bcu drug kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-12: bla med 'khor lo byed pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-13: rang gi phyogs nas las byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-14: 'bras bu don yod sbyin par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-15: khro bo'i lus la legs gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-16: khro bo'i rgyal pos byar bar bya; ;dam tshig la sogs cho ga bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-17: der ni rdo rje bsgoms nas bskul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-18: rkang ba'i rjes kyi sa blangs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-19: dur khrod thal ba dag dang bsre //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-20: de yi ras blangs mi rus dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-21: chu 'gram gnyis kyi sa dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-22: brtags nas lung bong gcin gyis sprul //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-23: de las dgra bo'i gzugs byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-24: de tshe gzugs brnyan bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-25: dug dang ske tshe lan chva dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-26: 'bru mar tsha ba rab bsres te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-27: dgra bo tsha ba bskyed pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-28: de yis lus nang rab tu dgang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-29: de nas rnam shes rlung 'dra ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-30: lcags kyu yis ni bkug nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-31: srin bu me khyer 'dra bcug ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-32: zhags pa yis ni dam du gzung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-33: de ni rdo rje sgrog tu gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-34: bsgrim nas de yi ming smos te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-35: dgra bo'i lus ni ma lus par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333a-36: bo son cha yi tsher mas dbug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-0: @333b mi rus las byas phur bu 'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-1: yang na seng ldeng las byung bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-2: dbral ba snying mgrin dbung mgo gnyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-3: gnas lnga dag tu bsgrims te gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-4: nim pa'i shing la sbar ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-5: me sbar ba la bskam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-6: mkhas pas rkang pa nas brtsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-7: mtshon cha rnon pos gtubs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-8: 'bar ba'i lus can khros pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-9: de yi dum bu sbyin sreg bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-10: las 'di la ni lhag par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-11: rus spal gyi ni rkang thabs sbyar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-12: nyi ma'i gung ngam nam phyed na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-13: las 'di nyid ni bsgrub par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-14: las 'di byas nas nges par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-15: gang zhig rgyal bas bsrungs na'ang des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-17: lha chen tshangs pas ci zhig smos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-18: phyi rol gyi drag shul spyod pa'i go cha'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-19: gsod pa'i ye shes las sprul pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-20: nang gi yang ni bshad par bya; ;bsgrub bya yid kyis bsrungs nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-21: cho ga bzhin du dgug par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-22: lag na ral gri mtshon cha dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-23: be chon rdo rje gtun shing zhags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-24: lag na 'khor lo mda' gzhu can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-25: khro bo sna tshogs bsnams pa des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-26: sgrub bya zhags pas bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-27: rdo rje yi ni khro bo yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-28: lho yi phyogs su khrid pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-29: rdo rje gzhan gyis brdeg pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-30: de ni ral gris gtub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-31: sgyu ma lang long nar bar bsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-32: aom h'um badzra r'aksha sa bhaksha ya tha phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-33: rdo rje srin mo bsgoms nas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-34: bya rog wa dang bya rgod kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:333b-35: kun nas yongs su bskor nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-0: @334a *// de dag zang thob byed par ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-1: sgom zhing ming nas skul bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-2: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-3: rdo rje rnga mo rnams bsams te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-4: bsgrub par bya bar yongs brtags pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-5: de yi rgyab tu zhon nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-6: rdo rje khro bos gzir bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-7: lho phyogs su ni bkri bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-8: de yi rkang rjes sa la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-9: rlung gis gtsubs pa'i shing lo la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-10: de yi ming nas brjod byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-11: rdo rje sna yon drung du sba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-12: de lta bur ni sbyor ba'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-13: bsgoms shing cho ga bzhin byas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-14: brgya byin nyid kyang bskrang 'gyur na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-15: sa steng skye bo smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-16: de mi gsang sngags dang spel te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-17: 'jug pa'i sgro la bris nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-18: dge sbyong bram ze'i skras dkris te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-19: sa yi 'og tu bskos nas gzhug /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-20: rdo rje khro bo gnyis kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-22: de ltar bsam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-24: h'um zhes bya bas gang ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-25: rdo rje phra mo bsgom byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-26: sna yi rtse mo nas bton te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-27: bsgrub bya'i lus ni dgang bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-28: lus kyi tshigs ni thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje bcings nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-31: des ni lus kyang bskam par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-32: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgoms te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-33: kun nas kyang ni gzhig bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-34: aom badzra d'a ki n'i aa mu ka sya rakta a'a karsha tsa sha ya h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334a-35: sbyor ba'i rim pa 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-0: @334b mkhas pas rlung gi phyogs song te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-2: spos kyi thig le bdun byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-3: de dag kham pa'i phor ba dgab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-4: de ni ri rab thams cad nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-5: rtse mo brgyad par sprul byas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-6: rdo rje 'phro bas brgyan pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-7: de dag rnams ni mnan par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-8: yam zhes bya bas bskyed pa'i rlung bdun rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-9: lam zhes bya bas mtshan ma dbang chen gyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-10: nang du rlung rnams nges par chud par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-11: de lta'i sbyor bas 'jig pa'i rlung yang bcings //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-12: padma 'dab brgyad bsgoms nas de'i 'dab la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-13: klu brgyad bkod dbus me tshogs 'bar ba can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-14: rdo rje khro bo'i sku yi zhabs mthil gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-15: klu rnams mnan na char sprin char ba 'bebs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-16: h'um zhes bya ba gnyis dbus klu rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-17: snying po yongs bcug spel mas gzir nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-18: h'um zhes bya ba bzlas brjod byas nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-19: 'jig dus char ba lta bu char ba 'bab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-20: nyi ma'i mdog ltar dmar po'i 'od bzang zhal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-21: nam mkha' khyab par rnam par gdangs nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-22: kun nas char chus yongs su gang ba'i sprin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-23: h'um zhes bya ba'i 'bar ba'i lce yis bldag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-24: dbugs rngub pa yis bkug nas 'byung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-25: shing bal bzhin du rab tu gtor bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-26: yang na rang gi phyag rgya tshogs 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-27: btang bas skad cig la ni bcad gtubs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-28: h'um zhe bya bas bsdigs pa byas na ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:334b-29: nam mkha' dag kyang ston ka'i dus ltar snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-2: zhabs drung dpral dbyes nas byung mi g-yo bran //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-3: bdud las rnam rgyal phyag drug mda' gzhu zhags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-4: ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje char 'bebs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-5: khro bo grangs med pa yis yongs bskor nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-6: bgegs rnams sreg mdzad h'um gi sgras bkang nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-7: 'jig rten gsum bo gang ba'ang rnam par 'jig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-8: rkang rjes sa dang mi yi khrag dag las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-9: mi yi gzugs byas mi rus phur bu la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-10: 'od zer can gyi gsang sngags bsgrags pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-11: lan grangs nyi shur mngon bsngags mig tu gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-12: tshogs kyi bdag po'i khar ni ming bcug gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-13: phyi bzhin rdo rje gtun shing dag gis brdung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-14: aom sumbha badzra mu sa le na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-15: tsurnna ya na ra bhi bighna na h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-16: las 'di bsams pas mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-17: me yi bgegs kyang bzlog par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-18: stang zil kha dog lta bu nam mkha' lding //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-19: lus la sprul stong dag gis brgyan byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-20: mkha' la 'dug nas gdengs ka stong ldan pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-21: klu brgyan dag dang char sprin rnams la bsgo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-22: brgya byin bka' ni de dag gis thos nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-23: sprin tshogs bum ba'i char gyis me yang gsod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-24: nam mkha' lding gis 'dab mas bkab nas ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-25: mchus brkos chu klung gis ni mtshams kyang bcad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-26: aom badzra n'a r'a ya na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335a-28: ma ha ni ba ma mu me ghe h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-0: zhal ras gsum ba ston ka'i zla ba'i @335b mdog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-1: phyag bzhi 'od dmar sna tshogs 'bar ba'i 'od //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-2: lha mo bzhi ba snyems ma byams ma dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-3: chu srin rgyal mtshan me tog rol bas bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-4: g-yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje legs gsor zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-5: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu sgeg par bzhag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-6: ldem bag 'jo sgeg tshul gyis rol ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-7: sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin rnams rnam par 'phel //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-8: rnam pa kun gyis rnam brgyan cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-9: rin chen cod pa na dbang bskur bas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-10: nam mkha' la ni 'bab pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-11: thog thog rnam par zlog par byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-13: che ge mo dza zhes bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-14: h'um zhes bya ba nas p'u ra ta bandha h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-15: sbyor ba 'di ni byas pa yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-16: bla med byang chub rgyas par 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-19: don yod gsang sngags rgyal rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-20: bzang po rnam pa bcu drug po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-21: kun dang drag po'i ting 'dzin la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-22: gnas pa yis ni khro bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-23: gsang sngags rdzogs mdzad rig rgyal ma //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-24: rnam pa kun dang ldan pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-25: rims bral rang gi ting 'dzin gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-26: thams cad ldan pa'i khor rnams la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-27: gzigs pa chen po rnam gzigs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-29: smin ma mdzes par bskyod nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-31: thugs kyi sems ni dga' bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:335b-32: dga' bar mdzad pa'i mod la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-2: shes rab chen po'i thog 'dren pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-3: bsgrims te so sor gsor nas des //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-4: bde chen ting 'dzin la gnas te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-5: ldem pag 'jo tshul gyis bltas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-6: lag gnyis padma'i tshul gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-7: spyi bor thal mo sbyar byas nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-8: ye shes lam ni rab ston pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-9: rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-10: lag na rdo rje stobs po che; ;yid rgyas pa yis tshig gsol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-11: ci slad rnam pa thams cad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-12: zur gyis rnam par gzigs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-13: smin ma bskyod byas 'dzum mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-14: ye shes rnam par bsgyings pas gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-15: byang chub chen po'i rdo rje can //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-16: lag na rdo rje gsol mod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-17: brtan zhing zab pa'i gsung gis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-18: sangs rgyas rnams kyi rol pa bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-19: sgom pa'i lam la legs byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-20: rdo rje ye shes rnams kyi thabs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-21: bde bas byang chub thob 'gyur ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-22: sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-24: gang la dngos rnams dngos med cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-25: mtha' gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-26: dbus la'ang spyod pa med pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-28: thabs dang shes rab rnam spangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-29: de la byang chub ji ltar rtogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-30: rtogs bar 'dod pa de dag ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-31: thabs rnams nga yis bshad par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336a-32: phung po dngos po yong med pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-0: byang chub sems @336b ni grogs gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-1: spro ba dang ni btung ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-2: sku gsum mchog ni mchod par bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-4: sems kyis chos rnams bstan pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-6: de bzhin nyid kyi rnam par bsgom //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-7: sems ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-8: byang chub kyang ni sgyu ma 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-9: dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'gas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-12: legs par byas pa'i gzugs dag la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-13: sbyor ba goms pas bsnun na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-14: rkang bzhi pa la sogs pa'i gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-15: zhen pa'i sems la snang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-16: de bzhin bsod nams ye shes las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-17: byung ba'i tshogs kyis sgom pa'i sems //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-18: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-19: bla med byang chub snang bar byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-20: dngos po don dam mi shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-21: phyi rol dngos la mngon zhen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-22: ngan par rtog pa'i rnam rtog gis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-23: rin chen sems 'di dri mar byas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-24: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-25: dngos po thams cad lngan zhes gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-26: de la gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-27: mi shes pa yis yongs su brtags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-28: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i mngon zhen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-29: don dam phyi rol byas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-30: theg pa dman pa rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-31: bla med byang chub ji ltar 'thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-32: byang chub rnam pa gnyis gsungs te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-33: lhag ma dang bcas lhag ma med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-34: lhag bcas phung po'i ngo bo ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:336b-35: nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su bsregs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-2: mkha' ltar dri ma med pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-3: bla med byang chub 'di ltar bur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-4: sangs rgyas kun gyis rnam bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-5: de yi byang chub spel ba'i phyir; ;las kyi tshul ni sna tshogs yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-6: rnal 'byor can gyi gsang sngags gang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-7: ye shes sems dpa'i zhabs drung du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-8: rtag tu mnyes byas ma grub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-9: lhag ma nga yis bshad bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-10: de ni bde blag thabs kyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-11: tshar bcad nas ni sgrub pa bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-12: rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-13: rdo rje zhags pa rab gdung byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-14: rdo rje khu tshur gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-15: rdo rje phur bu rnams 'dril byed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-16: rdo rje tho ba rdung ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-17: rdo rje nag mo char 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-18: lha rnams kun la 'jigs ba skyed //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-19: phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-20: bsgoms nas las la sbyar na ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-21: dam tshig rgyal bas bstan pa'i phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-22: mtshungs pa med pa'i las byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-23: gsang sngags rig pas h'um zhes pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-24: lcags kyu btang nas zhabs drung dgugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-25: 'di ni gal te sangs rgyas sam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-27: dam tshig gis ni zhugs pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-28: rdo rje bcing bas bcing bar bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-29: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-30: rdo rje nag mos kun tu bsdigs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-31: rdo rje yi ni phur bu yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-32: gzugs brnyan gyi ni gnas lnga po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-33: dpral ba mgrin pa snying ga dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337a-34: de bzhin dpung pa gnyis su gdab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-0: rdo rje thobs brdung @337b bar bya; ;cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-1: sangs rgyas nyid kyang nges par gnon //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-2: bsdigs la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-3: gzugs brnyan mig yor gyur ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-4: sangs rgyas byang chub rab rdzogs pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-5: dngos grub de tshe sbyin bar mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-6: 'di ni mthu yis grub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-7: sbyor ba gcig pu gsang chen yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-8: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gigs gsang ba'i sgrub pa thobs nas mgrin gcig tu thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-9: gtso bo rdo rje rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-10: dpa' bo chen po legs so zhes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-11: zab mo chos kyi mchog gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-12: dam ba bshad pa mdzad pa legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-13: sems can phan phyir thugs rje yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-14: lcags kyus kun nas 'bar ba legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-15: bdag med chos rnams sgrub pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-16: ye shes snying khu 'bar ba legs gsang chen thams cad bstan pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-17: rdo rje theg pa nges par gsungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-18: theg pa'i tshul 'di la gnas na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-19: bla med byang chub bde bar thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-20: aom badzra aam ku sha a'a karsha ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-21: aom badzra p'a sha bandha h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-22: aom badzra takki r'a dz'a ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-24: aom badzra k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-25: aom badzra mud ga ra a'a ko ta ya h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-26: ye shes kyi snying khu'i snying po can du gyur pa'i gang sngags dag pa mchog tu gyur pa don yod pa'i las 'di dag su la yang bstan par mi bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:337b-27: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul 'dra ba las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-0: sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sgrub pa'i rim @338a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-1: par phye ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen pos sbyor ba'i las thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rdo rjes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dbab pa la sogs pa'i las bya ba 'di bshad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-3: aom zhes bya ba mgor bzhag ste //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-11: gzugs kyi ngo bor bsams nas su //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-14: brjod par bya ba thogs pa med pa'i phreng ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-16: samya ksam buddha ko t'i na na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-18: aom tsa le tsu le tsunde sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-19: brtson 'grus chen po thogs pa med par 'dul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338a-21: pha rol gnon pa che ba /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-083-015:338b-53: rdo rje bcing ba bskyod par bya'o //
